pull_request.title: fix quotidiano.net group broken video, annoyances and social
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request ## Prerequisites ### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms - [x] This is not an ad/bug report; - [x] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project; - [x] I have performed a self-review of my own changes; - [x] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure. ## What problem does the pull request fix? ### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section - [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers; - [x] Website or app doesn't work properly; - [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website; - [ ] Missed analytics or tracker; - [x] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc; - [x] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc; - [ ] Filters maintenance. ## What issue is being fixed? ### Add your comment and screenshots 1. Your comment This pull request is to fix all quotidiano.net group, that is 1) `ilrestodelcarlino.it` (already fixed, issue #168507 ) 2) `quotidiano.net` (already fixed, issue #168542 ) 3) `lanazione.it` (screenshot 1) check -> https://www.lanazione.it/firenze/cronaca/allarme-bomba-casa-pound-94924538 4) `ilgiorno.it` (screenshot 2) check -> https://www.ilgiorno.it/pavia/cronaca/milano-belgioioso-pullman-incidente-48bc51e1 5) `iltelegrafolivorno.it` (screenshot 3) check -> https://www.iltelegrafolivorno.it/cronaca/inaugurato-a-livorno-il-nuovo-ponte-in-via-di-salviano-bd16c8f6 In addition, `lanazione.it` whatsapp subscription (let me know if it's the wrong section or you prefer don't hide it) (screenshot 4) 2. Screenshots
Screenshot 1:
Screenshot 2:
Screenshot 3: Screenshot 4: ### Terms - [x] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [http://www.facebook.com](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.facebook.com) ### Comment > Simply open www.facebook.com on Safari, with Request Mobile Website selected. You get Reels, and Suggested Pages, which while these are not technically ads, they are definitely Annoyances that should be filtered out by AdGuard. Try switching to Request Desktop Website, and everything goes wrong. Reels, Suggested for you posts, Sponsored posts, all of it. > > Blocking on this website worked reasonably well until right around the time iOS 17 was officially released, and now it hasn’t worked at all since. Still completely broken on iOS using Safari. Every third pay I get something like this. That’s using the mobile website. If I switch to the desktop website, full on sponsored posts. I just want someone to either fix it, or straight up say it can’t be fixed, so that I can tell AdGuard Support that they can stop telling me to wait for even more months while a fix never happens. Lifetime Family subscription here, too. Please stop closing the ticket with zero resolution.

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

pull_request.title: cleanup
pull_request.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
obsolete rules, parked/dead domains.
### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

issue.title: cleanup
issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
obsolete rules, parked/dead domains.
### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body: @D4niloMR Next time please write what is removing as dead domains and what - as obsolete/duplicate rules. It will be easier for us to understand the changes of your pull request and merge it.

> Не повторяется. Перезапуск компьютера влияет на ситуацию?

Перезагрузка не помогла. У меня вообще почти ничего не блокируется именно на этом сайте: реклама иногда проскакивает, браузерный помощник не отображается, пользовательские правила не работают. Не работает только на нем, примерно  с начала недели, все остальные сайты работают нормально. Могу записать скринкаст, если необходимо

comment.body:
I cannot reproduce it on Android, but I see them on iPad.
In the case of desktop version it's related to - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/163094#issuecomment-1845433407
It looks like that on iPad `m.facebook.com` have different structure than on smaller devices. I will add rule for this case, but I don't have iPhone, so I cannot check it out.

> Не падает. Проверил в Mint в 120.

в-третьих: ждать когда они обновят chromium до 120 можно долго и не факт что это поможет

comment.body:
Could you please test these rules:
```adblock
ruyamanga.com#%#//scriptlet("abort-current-inline-script", "document.createElement", "break;case $.")
$xmlhttprequest,third-party,denyallow=linkvertise.com|fastly.net|statically.io|sharecast.ws|bunnycdn.ru|bootstrapcdn.com|cdn.ampproject.org|cloudflare.com|cdn.staticfile.org|disqus.com|disquscdn.com|dmca.com|ebacdn.com|facebook.net|fastlylb.net|fbcdn.net|fluidplayer.com|fontawesome.com|github.io|google.com|googleapis.com|googletagmanager.com|gstatic.com|jquery.com|jsdelivr.net|jwpcdn.com|jwplatform.com|polyfill.io|recaptcha.net|shrink.pe|twitter.com|ulogin.ru|unpkg.com|userapi.com|vidazoo.com|vk.com|yastatic.net|ytimg.com|zencdn.net|youtube.com|cackle.me|googleoptimize.com|vuukle.com|chatango.com|twimg.com|google-analytics.com|hcaptcha.com|raincaptcha.com|media-imdb.com|blogger.com|hwcdn.net|instagram.com|wp.com|fastcomments.com|plyr.io,_____,domain=ruyamanga.com
```
In theory the first rule should be enough, but this ad script is at the top of the website, so in extension scriptlet is sometimes executed too late, that's why both rules are required.

comment.body:
Не повторяется с вашими настройками.
Попробуйте выключить и снова включить контент-блокеры в настройках Сафари, а также обновить фильтры Адгарда.
Важно не закрывать окно Адгарда при обновлении фильтров в течение ~90 секунд, иначе iOS прервёт процесс применения фильтров.

issue.title: cleanup
issue.body:
# Creating the pull request

> Please include a summary of the change and which issue is fixed\
> If the related issue does not exist in our repository, please create it before making pull request\
> It is highly recommended to use our [Web Reporting Tool](https://kb.adguard.com/technical-support/reporting-tool) instead of creating an issue on GitHub directly\
> Please note, that we verify every pull request manually, so it may take time to apply it

## Prerequisites

### To avoid invalid pull requests, please check and confirm following terms

- [X] This is not an ad/bug report;
- [X] My code follows the [guidelines](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md) and [syntax](https://kb.adguard.com/general/how-to-create-your-own-ad-filters) of this project;
- [X] I have performed a self-review of my own changes;
- [X] My changes do not break web sites, apps and files structure.

## What problem does the pull request fix?
obsolete rules, parked/dead domains.
### If the problem does not fall under any category that is listed here, please write a comment below in corresponding section

- [ ] Missed ads or ad leftovers;
- [ ] Website or app doesn't work properly;
- [ ] AdGuard gets detected on a website;
- [ ] Missed analytics or tracker;
- [ ] Social media buttons — share, like, tweet, etc;
- [ ] Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc;
- [X] Filters maintenance.

## What issue is being fixed?

### Enter the issue address

Example: <https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/100000>

### Add your comment and screenshots

#### If possible, a screenshot of a page or application should not be cropped too much. Otherwise, it is not always clear where the element is located

0. **DO NOT** upload screenshots with sexually explicit material on GitHub directly.\
 Instead, upload it to a third-party image hosting and post the link to it without preview (!) here.\
 Also, mention if the link leads to NSFW content;

1. Add screenshots of the problem. You can drag and drop images or paste them from clipboard

    Use `<details> </details>` tag to hide screenshots under the spoiler;

2. Describe the issue in detail until it is absolutely clear from the screenshot what the problem is

    You can also indicate any other information that you think the developers should know.

**Warning:** Please remove personal information before uploading screenshots!

1. Your comment

<!-- Please write a comment here -->

2. Screenshots

<details>

<summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

<details>

<summary>Screenshot N:</summary>

<!-- paste screenshot here -->

</details>

### Terms

- [X] By submitting this issue, I agree that pull request does not contain private info and all conditions are met

comment.body: Okay, thanks.

comment.body:
> Go to YouTube home. There should be an Ad as shown in image.
> 
> Additional tests: Brave iOS does not block, Firefox focus iOS does block.

Cannot reproduce with your settings. 
Please try to disable-enable content blockers in Safari settings and restart Safari, and check for filters update.
Do not close AdGuard window ~90 seconds, because iOS will breaks configuration process.

issue.title: pikabu.ru

labels.name: NSFW
labels.description: Nudes and porn sites

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
Известно, что эта проблема решается с помощью AdGuard Extra.

Если вы пользуетесь AdGuard на устройствах Windows, Mac или Android, пожалуйста, убедитесь, что AdGuard Extra включена в настройках приложения.

Если вы используете расширение AdGuard для браузера, рекомендуется также установить AdGuard Extra.

* [Установка на браузеры Chrome, Edge или другие, основанные на Chromium](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_chrome_release)
* [Установка на Firefox](https://agrd.io/adguard_extra_firefox_release)

comment.body:
> Site pikabu.ru is social media and it doesn’t play video from YouTube properly. Other video links from different sources play correctly, the only problem is YouTube links.
> Also I’ve asked pikabu’s support but there was no answer still.

Нужна прямая ссылка. Проблем не замечаю.
